title: Bookr: Read BD on his psp (Lire des BD sur sa PSP)
description:
The PSP"s large screen is perfect for reading and the Bookr homebrew allows you to do just that

Requirements:

Any PSP with Custom Firmware installed.

Download Bookr plugin

How to install Bookr on your PSP
Extract the Bookr pack anywhere on your computer
Connect your PSP to your PC
Copy the entire GAME folder into PSP 
Disconnect your PSP
Run the Bookr Application
It's that simple! 

it can read PDF and txt files
Commands
Commandes
Previous Page: triangle
Next Page : square
the next10 pages: X
the previous 10 pages: rond 
Zoom in: R
Zoom out: L
Tested on CFW 6.60 pro-C and works fine. Thanks

Bookr est un homebrew pour PSP qui permet de lire des documents sur sa PSP. Il supporte les formats .txt .pdf ..chm .htm et diverses autres. Il est simple et facile a utiliser.
